nodes.label: TECHNOLOGICAL: Funding metrics and grant criteria ...
nodes.claim: TECHNOLOGICAL: Funding metrics and grant criteria disproportionately reward prior publications, reputational capital, and incremental milestones over novel, high-risk investigations.

nodes.label: EXISTENTIAL: Policy and funding cultures valorize ...
nodes.claim: EXISTENTIAL: Policy and funding cultures valorize near-term safety assurances, leading to underinvestment in speculative, long-horizon alignment research with potentially higher payoff.

nodes.claim: Practical: Short-horizon funding leads to a proliferation of near-term AI projects that prioritize verifiable milestones over fundamental alignment research, potentially leaving long-horizon alignment gaps unresolved.

nodes.label: Emotional/psychological: Researchers and instituti...
nodes.claim: Emotional/psychological: Researchers and institutions may experience frustration or burnout if long-term, high-uncertainty goals are deprioritized, eroding trust in the research ecosystem.

nodes.label: Logical/strategic: Organizations might become over...
nodes.claim: Logical/strategic: Organizations might become overconfident in incremental milestones, reinforcing a narrow evaluation framework that misses systemic alignment failures or emergent risks.

nodes.label: TECHNOLOGICAL: Funding contracts and grant criteri...

nodes.label: EXISTENTIAL: Policymakers and funders seek rapid a...
